content: S-B (T) Torsion screwdriver bit Professional-performance screwdriver bit with torsion zone for soft joint applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- - ### FEATURES:Features Elastic torsion zone in the bit shank cushions higher loads – the bit twists slightly under impact for greater durability and extended service life Extra-high-strength steel reduces the risk of premature bit breakage Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip, precision-machined to help reduce stripping and wobbling Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Recommended for use with cordless universal drivers in soft-joint applications, e.g. in wood or drywall board For driving screws in a variety of materials Torx®, Phillips®, square, hexagon, SL and Pozi® versions available ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 1 in Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039069 - Driver bit S-B HEX5 25/1 HP (10) - Package Size 10 pc - 2039070 - Driver bit S-B HEX6 25/1 HP (10) - Package Size 10 pc - 2039059 - Torx insert bits S-B TX 25 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc - 2039061 - Torx insert bits S-B TX 27 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc
